comments:
3.0M6 (build 200312182000) [Maybe a dup of bug 42792]

I can't merge single files with another CVS branch -- but for the whole project,
it works.

Steps (my real example was in jdt.ui.tests.refactoring, which is very huge):
- checkout project org.junit from HEAD
- on file 'plugin.xml', call context menu > Team > Merge...
- select R2_1 as starting point
- select branch JUNIT381 to merge changes from
- click 'Finish'
=> Now I get the log entries below.
Note that it works fine if I do the same steps on the project directory.

Log:
